message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $150 to you, and we're willing to sell it to you at a special introductory price of $140. Don't miss out on this opportunity to get a great deal!
Thanks for the offer, Alice. I appreciate the discount, but $140 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $130. What do you think?

Thank you for your response, Bob. We understand your budget constraints. In order to accommodate your needs, we're now offering the product at $135. This is a great deal, and we believe it strikes a good balance between value and price. Please let us know if this works for you!
